title: The Frog's world
brief_description: Life cycle and habits of the different species of frogs and toads which live in the Japanese rice fields; how to catch them and care for them in an aquarium. The large number of eggs and tadpoles appearing each year is soon reduced by predators such as the newt, drgaon fly larvae and the water mantis. Titles and credits in Japanese. English commentary.
